page.title: 06New Deer Agricultural Show
page.content: This{two day event}is held at the {end of July}under the auspices of{New {Deer Agricultural Association.}It is held in the showpark at Artamford on a Friday and Saturday. On the Friday all manner of farm {stock are judged}and farm and household produce are judged in the {"Industrial Tent" (run by the W.R.I.) which also includes a section for {childrens entries. On the Saturday there are{sports , {stock judging (for the Young Farmers), {clay pidgeon shoots, pony and trotting {races,show jumping, highland dancing, {tug-o'-war,side shows, entertainments {and machinery displays. On both nights there are{dances}in the marquee and in the Winter there is a{dinner dance with presentation of {trophies.
